text.__SUMMARY__: Psychotria plicata is a species of plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is endemic to Jamaica.
text.Sources: Kelly, D.L. (1998). "Psychotria plicata". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T33882A9811239. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T33882A9811239.en. Retrieved 22 December 2017.
